data.message: What the hell is this shit here? And for the stupid fool who said dont judge by the cover....have you heard his new cd? Have you seen the rap god video where he walks on water? I personally like em and the music but damn man dont be stupid...he's on some dark shit here. Do you see the "#rapture" up top. are you even smart enough to understand what your seeing means? a lack of brains is so abundant these days. Take the shit for what it is...and if you still like it then listen to it...but dont say he's not droping messages on some crazy shit here just to make yourself feel better about listening to it.
